content-containers.summary: Provide layout components to organize and display content in structured and flexible formats.

controls.summary: Include components that manage user interactions and input, enabling intuitive navigation and selection.

error-communication.summary: Contain various error and alert states to communicate issues or restrictions.

helpers.summary: Offer utility components that enhance usability and provide additional guidance or information within the UI.

status-and-state-indicators.summary: Visualize entity states, statuses, and loading indicators to inform users of system conditions or processes.
